H0.text: The mountainous and partly lawless province of Nuristan lies in the north-east of which country. Pakistan

H1.text: The mountainous and partly lawless province of Nuristan lies in the north-east of which country. India

H2.text: The mountainous and partly lawless province of Nuristan lies in the north-east of which country. Tajikistan

H3.text: The mountainous and partly lawless province of Nuristan lies in the north-east of which country. IROA

A4.text: Nuristan is a province of Afghanistan

A5.text: Nuristan is bordered on the east by Pakistan
